title: (x) The Classic Sounds script on bass drum skin - Ariston {Patricia}
content:
Hello all!  
 Had a question about the script on this drum. I’m creating a website for this band and they already had this identity in multiple places so I thought I would run with it. Any ideas on the typeface’s name?

Thanks,  
Chris

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [classicsounds.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231933/http:/typophile.com/files/classicsounds.jpg) | 32.58 KB |

 [‹ (x) Gravis logo - custom designed {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231933/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30275 "Go to previous forum topic") [font of my fax printer ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231933/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30301 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marketplicity

comments.content: …as used by designer Vaughan Oliver on many **Pixies** pieces. _(Some rock typo-trivia)_
Vaughan Oliver is da man of da obscure typefaces. :^)
